creator.description:
A labeling service to help me see at a glance if an account is on any of my lists.

Other goals:

Label users engaging in toxic behavior to help people remove toxic content from users' Bluesky experience.

Labels for which PFN categories users fall under.

locales.description: Accounts on my Propaganda and Fake News list. Anyone who spreads disinformation, knowingly or unknowingly, and/or hateful content. Includes MSM, politicians, corporations, MAGA, KHive, NAFO, Zionists, xenophobes (such as racists, misogynists, and anti-LGBTQ), and more.
locales.name: Propaganda and Fake News

locales.description: Accounts on my The "Dore-anged" list. Pundits/personalities/coattail riders who are addicted to smearing Jimmy Dore for clicks, and/or others who spread said smears without question. Simply disliking him does not qualify you to be on this list. You have to be complaining about him regularly and/or pushing easily debunkable claims.
locales.name: The "Dore-anged"

locales.description: Accounts on my Blocks I Have Earned list. Includes people who are triggered by and/or absolutely terrified of me, subscribed to a blocklist without vetting the accounts on it first, or mistook me for Matt Mercy's @ipwnedubsky.social "parody" account in 2023.
locales.name: Blocks I Have Earned

locales.description: Accounts from my Needs to Be Banned list. Toxic accounts that have no place on any social media site. Mass-reporting them is strongly encouraged.
locales.name: Needs to Be Banned

locales.description: Accounts from my Fronts, Shells, and Shills list. They're not as independent and unbiased as they may seem... Includes paid spokespeople, non-profits that receive big donations in exchange for pushing their donors' narratives, NGOs, government cutouts, shell companies, and anyone with undisclosed conflicts of interest.
locales.name: Fronts, Shells, and Shills

locales.description: Users who have a history of wishing harm on others.
locales.name: Users Who Wish Harm on Others

locales.description: Users who have a history of encouraging others to commit suicide.
locales.name: Users Who Encourage Others to Commit Suicide

locales.description: Users who have a history of inciting harassment against others.
locales.name: Users Who Incite Harassment

locales.description: Users who have a history of inciting violence against others.
locales.name: Users Who Incite Violence

locales.description: MAGA accounts from the Propaganda and Fake News list. Accounts with this label usually engage in Trump bootlicking, pushing "anti-woke" culture war nonsense, and making pathetic trolling attempts.
locales.name: MAGA

locales.description: Blue MAGA accounts from the Propaganda and Fake News list. Accounts with this label usually engage in Democrat bootlicking, pushing DEI and identity politics culture war nonsense, and they believe everything that the mainstream media tells them.
locales.name: Blue MAGA

locales.description: Users who have indicated through their profile picture, bio, posts, and/or other means that they are NAFO trolls. Accounts with this label usually engage in Zelenskyy bootlicking, dismissing anything that they disagree with as Russian propaganda, and being racist against Russian people.
locales.name: NAFO

locales.description: Zionists from the Propaganda and Fake News list. Accounts with this labal usually engage in Netanyahu bootlicking, genocide apologia and/or support, pushing debunked or unconfirmed stories that were pushed by Israel, and falsely equating anti-Zionism with antisemitism.
locales.name: Zionists
